pr_title: DDF-5845 Moved ResourceManagement to a new repo

timeline.bodyText:
I ran the following command and it generated this part. Not sure if I need to do something different.

yarn ace pom --fix
timeline.author: shaundmorris

timeline.bodyText: Based on what we have left in this profile, looks like a good candidate to remove
timeline.author: shaundmorris
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,7 +48,6 @@
              description="This will install all the applications for development purposes."
              start-level="3">
         <feature>profile-standard</feature>

timeline.bodyText: I was a little torn on removing it from there, but I suppose it can be added to a policy later that uses resource management
timeline.author: shaundmorris
